channel.title: Pages on Mads Kjeldgaard
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Mads Kjeldgaard

item.title: Software
item.description: Most of the software I develop as part of my practice is made available on Github. DSP mkplugins - A collection of C++ based DSP plugins for SuperCollider. faustgen - The Faust compiler embedded in SuperCollider. Gutter Synth for SuperCollider SuperCollider packages OutputFX - Easy output fx management CC14 - 14 bit midi for SuperCollider Sleet - A library / factory for SuperCollider sound effects allbuf - Create all possible buffer player patches as SynthDefs in SuperCollider (all = many) PolyBuf - Load samples to buffers, easily Particular - A SuperCollider package for particle synthesis mk-synthlib - My personal synthesizer factory/library for SuperCollider Vim faust-nvim - Faust plugin for Vim microcontroller-nvim - Microcontroller plugin for NeoVim, integrating Platformio seamlessly and adding nifty commands for Teensy and other popular dev boards.

item.title: Movies
item.description: These are films that I saw (oftentime with Sofie) and liked a lot and that I recommend others to watch as well. title year A Separation 2011 Alien 1979 All Hands On Deck 2020 Alphaville 1965 Amour 2012 Antichrist 2009 Apocalypse Now 1979 Ascenseur pour l’échafaud 1958 Bacurau 2019 Beanpole 2019 Borgman 2013 Brazil 1985 Bullhead 2011 Caché 2005 Chaser 2008 Down Terrace 2009 Elle 2016 Embrace of the serpent 2015 Festen 1998 Fucking Åmål 1999 Hiroshima Mon Amour 1959 Ikiru 1952 In the mood for love 2000 Kramer vs.

item.title: Sound
item.description: Releases 3D audio Verdenskværnen I solens flint 1000 floder

item.title: About
item.description: new Twitch.Player("twitch-embed", { video: "895251155", height: 500, width: 900 }); Bio Mads Kjeldgaard (b. 1988 Horsens, Denmark) is an electronic music composer. His main field of interest as a composer is computer music. He has studied Electronic Music Composition at the Danish Institute of Electronic Music (DIEM) at the Royal Academy of Music and has a degree in journalism from the Danish School of Media and Journalism.

item.title: Concerts
item.description: Past concerts: September 20th-21st, Ultima Festival @ Sentralen. World premiere of 3D audio piece “I solens flint 1000 floder” + ambisonic remixes of classic works of Else Marie Pade, Bernard Parmegiani and Edgar(d) Varése. June 17th, SCOslo community concert @ Notam. April 28th, IAC, Malmø, Sweden @ INTONAL Festival. Acousmatic concert with Giuseppe Pisano March 9th, 2019, Kulturhuset, Oslo, Norway @ Fritt Fall. Livecode / improvisation. December 6th, 2018, Cappelens Forslag, Oslo, Norway @ Hollow Body Timbals release.
